name.namePart: United States District Court District of Nebraska

titleInfo.title: USA v. Holbert et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Kimberly Krueger. It is ordered that: (1) Counsel for the government shall notify the court when the motion for reduction in sentence pursuant to Rule 35(b) 94 is ripe for decision. The motion shall not be decided until counsel for the government certifies that the motion is ripe;(2) Counsel for the defendant, if previously appointed pursuant to the Criminal Justice Act, is reappointed to represent the defendant for purposes of the Rule 35(b) motion. If retained, counsel for the defendant remains as counsel for the defendant until the Rule 35(b) motion is resolved or until given leave to withdraw; (3) The Federal Public Defender shall provide CJA counsel with a new voucher; (4) Fhe Clerk of the Court shall provide a copy of this order to counsel for the government and counsel for the defendant. The undersigned's judicial assistant will provide a copy to the Federal Public Defender. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 9/19/2005. (KLL, )

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 8:03-cr-00579; USA v. Holbert et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER as to defendant Kimberly Krueger. It is ordered that: (1) Counsel for the government shall notify the court when the motion for reduction in sentence pursuant to Rule 35(b) 94 is ripe for decision. The motion shall not be decided until counsel for the government certifies that the motion is ripe;(2) Counsel for the defendant, if previously appointed pursuant to the Criminal Justice Act, is reappointed to represent the defendant for purposes of the Rule 35(b) motion. If retained, counsel for the defendant remains as counsel for the defendant until the Rule 35(b) motion is resolved or until given leave to withdraw; (3) The Federal Public Defender shall provide CJA counsel with a new voucher; (4) Fhe Clerk of the Court shall provide a copy of this order to counsel for the government and counsel for the defendant. The undersigned's judicial assistant will provide a copy to the Federal Public Defender. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 9/19/2005. (KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Holbert et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Kimberly Krueger. It is ordered that: (1) The government's oral request for Rule 35 hearing is granted; (2) A hearing on the government's motion for reduction of sentence pursuant to Rule 35(b) 94 has been set before the undersigned United States district judge on Monday, April 3, 2006, at 1:00 p.m., in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska; (3) At the request of the defendant through her counsel, and with the agreement of the government, the defendant may be absent from the hearing on the Rule 35 motion. (4) The Marshal is directed not to return the defendant to the district. (5) The defendant is held to have waived her right to be present.***Rule 35(b) Motion Hearing set for 4/3/2006 at 01:00 PM before Judge Richard G. Kopf. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 3/29/2006. (KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Holbert et al
titleInfo.subTitle: AMENDED JUDGMENT (Reduction of Sentence) as to Kimberly Krueger (2). Count(s) 1, Defendant's sentence of imprisonment is reduced from the original sentence to a term of fifty-four (54) months; five (5) years of Supervised Release with Special Conditions; $100 Special Assessment (PAID); Count(s) 2, 5, 6, of the Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only as to defendant(s) Kimberly Krueger. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 4/4/2006. 4 CERTIFIED COPIES TO USM. (GJG, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Holbert et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL as to defendant Kimberly Krueger. The Federal Public Defender for the District of Nebraska is appointed to represent the above named defendant in this matter. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (JAB)
